title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-GLIBC-15019108 in glibc/libc6@2.41-12+deb13u1
description:
## CVE-2026-0915

**Severity:** low
**Package:** glibc/libc6@2.41-12+deb13u1
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**Snyk Priority Score:** 150/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2026-0915](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2026-0915)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `glibc` package and not the `glibc` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

Calling getnetbyaddr or getnetbyaddr_r with a configured nsswitch.conf that specifies the library's DNS backend for networks and queries for a zero-valued network in the GNU C Library version 2.0 to version 2.42 can leak stack contents to the configured DNS resolver.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `glibc`.

- [https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2026-0915](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2026-0915)
